item.title: ubuntu docker create and open ssh
item.description: The preparatory work Pull ubuntu image 1 docker pull ubuntu:20.04 Run ubuntu container back 1 docker run -itd -p 3022:22 -p 3021:8080 ubuntu:20.04 bash 3022 is ssh port, 3021 is web port Configuration Into the container 1 docker exec -it 1c0 bash 1c0 is the first three letters of container id Set the root password 1 passwd root Update and upgrade
